topic.title: Improvements in the Export Folder function

body.p:
An improvement has been implemented for the Export Folder function:
The With redundancy report data option has been added. The default export behavior has been changed to automatically exclude the redundancy report data when a folder is exported from OpenTM2. This will reduce the size of the exported folder. Selecting the With redundancy report data option will force this data to be included in the exported folder.
